propSpec.name: canvasSize
propSpec.desc: The square size of the canvas. If the size is 1000, the midpoint will actually be [0, 0] and the top-left point will be [-500, -500]

propSpec.name: tZoomToFit
propSpec.desc: Set to true to auto pan and zoom the canvas to display all child components

propSpec.name: zoomToFitElementsSelector
propSpec.desc: When set, only child components that match this CSS selector will be included in the calculation. See examples here: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/CSS_selectors

propSpec.name: excludedClassesPanning
propSpec.desc: An array of class names that, when hovered over, should not allow panning

propSpec.name: excludedClassesWheelZooming
propSpec.desc: An array of class names that, when hovered over, should not allow 'mouse wheel zooming'

propSpec.name: excludedClassesPinchZooming
propSpec.desc: An array of class names that, when hovered over, should not 'piunch gesture zooming'
